The photos were taken in February 2020 f: Daniel Moi, not on March 19, 2021, as claimed.
The photos were originally published by: a Kenyan online media outlet, on February 3, 2020, confirming their age and context.
The Lee Funeral Home is a high: end morgue in Kenya that handles funeral arrangements for prominent individuals, but there were no recent deaths of former politicians announced by the Kenyan government on March 19, 2021.
Jimmy Kibaki: the son of former president Mwai Kibaki, publicly confirmed on March 19, 2021, that his father was safe and healthy, debunking the rumors about the Lee Funeral Home.
